# Producer Checklist (Fillable)

Episode Title: _______________________
Episode ID/Slug: ______________________
Recording Date/Time: __________________
Location: _____________________________
Guest(s): _____________________________

## Pre-Production
- [ ] Confirm calendar invite and time zone.
- [ ] Finalize run-of-show and segment timing.
- [ ] Collect guest bio, headshot, and links.
- [ ] Collect sponsor copy and disclosures.
- [ ] Prepare show notes outline and CTA.
- [ ] Send prep email to host and guest.
- [ ] Confirm equipment list and backups.

## Fact Checking & Research
- [ ] Verify guest bio details.
- [ ] Verify sponsor claims and required phrases.
- [ ] Confirm dates, venues, and ticket URLs.
- [ ] Log sources and citations: _______________________

## Inter-Office Communications
- [ ] Send final run-of-show to team.
- [ ] Confirm roles (host, producer, moderator).
- [ ] Share emergency contact list.
- [ ] Update status in team channel: _______________________

## Show Day - Technical
- [ ] Pre-show tech check completed (see `docs/templates/pre_show_tech_check.md`).
- [ ] Recording and stream destinations confirmed.
- [ ] Backups enabled (local + cloud).
- [ ] OBS profile and scene collection loaded.

## Post-Production
- [ ] Files organized and backed up.
- [ ] Proxy files generated (if needed).
- [ ] Edit delivered to review.
- [ ] Captions reviewed and exported.
- [ ] Final masters exported and verified.

## Publishing & Social
- [ ] Episode uploaded and scheduled.
- [ ] Website updated with transcript.
- [ ] Social posts scheduled and validated.
- [ ] Report issues or risks: _______________________
